title: Beware of numbers starting with +92
selftext: I was in college and I had Exam. I got Multiple calls from my Mother. As I had my Unit Tests in 10 Minutes My phone was on Silent. When I checked the Phone my Mother Told me "Someone claimed that I was raped by them, And were asking money from my Parents" I am 19M Btw. Their was a Person trying to Mimic me and crying. But my Mother recognized it was not me. So yeah beware from WhatsApp Calls starting with 92.
comments: Beware of any number unknown that's not from +91...
Indian telecom and ISPs really need to come up with something to deter scams. It's insane the amount of fraud that happens these days.
I once had a Pakistani guy call me on WhatsApp with Amitabh Bachhan's voice and saying I had won a lucky draw on KBC.
I see, I guess they atleast Went through the Effort to Use AI. These guys made a Dumb Mistake. Which made my Mother RÃ©alise right away.
No AI. he was just miming Bachhan
Oooh..... ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ I see. Sorry for assuming.
